Container.Name: tubesync

Config.Name: AppData Config
Config.Description: AppData config path. Default is /mnt/user/appdata/tubesync. Container Path: /config

Config.Name: Downloads
Config.Description: Path to store downloaded content. Container Path: /downloads

Config.Name: TubeSync WebUI
Config.Description: TubeSync WebUI port. Default is 4848. Container port is 4848.

Config.Name: TubeSync Workers
Config.Description: If you add a significant amount of

Config.Name: TubeSync WebUI Username
Config.Description: Sets the username for HTTP basic authentication. Default is none. (HTTP_USER)

Config.Name: TubeSync WebUI Password
Config.Description: Sets the password for HTTP basic authentication. Default is none. (HTTP_PASS)

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: UID for permissions. Do not change unless you know what you're doing.

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: GID for permissions. Do not change unless you know what you're doing.
